name: stripe
title: Stripe Quicklinks
description: This extension allows you to make an invoice, create a payment, add a new product, and start a new subscription.
author: pradeepb28

commands.name: create-a-new-invoice
commands.title: Create New Invoice
commands.subtitle: Stripe
commands.description: It creates an invoice for your business on your stripe account

commands.name: create-a-new-product
commands.title: Create New Product
commands.subtitle: Stripe
commands.description: Add a new offering to your stripe product catalog

commands.name: create-a-new-subscription
commands.title: Create New Subscription
commands.subtitle: Stripe
commands.description: Create new subscription accounts for your customers
